attributes.action: Do not allow immigrants housing benefit, job seekers allowance until they have proved they have contributed to this country for a minimum of 2 years
attributes.additional_details: When will this so called "government" realise that the only way to reduce our debt is to stop giving money away to everyone that claims "asylum" we are a laughing stock to other countries... ...we have to work to live... we get nothing for nothing...what gives the government the right to give our hard earned money to those that "claim asylum" or "human rights" but the government cannot even prove the request is justified ..the so called government has lost control of the entire immigration/benefit/housing/healthcare etc. situation. I have noticed that on many petitions related to any immigration issue re the above they are usualy rejected! Says it all really.! If you agree please sign.
